TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPartitionResolver

summary.span: 定义必须实现的方法，这些方法用于自定义的会话状态分区解析。

span.span: Defines methods that must be implemented for custom session-state partition resolution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现接口和和方法，如果你要提供自定义分区解析用于会话状态数据跨多个后端节点时在 SQL 或状态服务器模式。Implement the interface and the and methods, if you are providing custom partition resolution for session-state data across multiple backend nodes when in SQL or state-server mode. 可以在中配置的会话状态管理信息[sessionState 元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d)具有的配置文件的`partitionResolverType`属性。The session-state management information can be configured in the [sessionState Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bda6fb8c-0076-43e3-9ce2-8cf1f8bdaa7d) of the configuration file with the `partitionResolverType` attribute. 如果为指定值`partitionResolverType`属性，`sqlConnectionString`和`stateConnectionString`属性将被忽略。If a value is specified for the `partitionResolverType` attribute, the `sqlConnectionString` and `stateConnectionString` attributes are ignored. 此外可以使用以编程方式设置分区解析配置属性。The partition resolution configuration can also be set programmatically using the property. 如果指定属性，则和属性会被忽略。If the property is specified, the and properties are ignored.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Initialize() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化自定义的分区解析器。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法以提供所需的自定义分区解析任何初始化代码。Use the method to provide any initialization code that is needed for your custom partition resolution. 创建类型实现接口，调用方法对其进行初始化 （一次每个实例），并且然后指示 ASP.NET 状态服务或分区正在使用和传递的 SQL Server 提供程序到提供程序解析程序实例。The creates the type implementing the interface, calls the method to initialize it (once per instance), and then indicates to the ASP.NET state service or SQL Server provider that partitioning is being used and passes a resolver instance to the provider.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string ResolvePartition(object key) cil managed
Public Function ResolvePartition (key As Object) As String

param.name: key
param.span: 用于确定要将哪个分区用于当前会话状态的标识符。

span.span: An identifier used to determine which partition to use for the current session state.
Resolves the partition based on a key parameter.

returns.span: 带有连接信息的字符串。

remarks.format: ## Remarks `key`参数方法是属性。The `key` parameter of the method is the property. 属性唯一地标识浏览器与服务器上的会话数据。The property uniquely identifies a browser with session data on the server.
